p: Similarly, the administration of LAT significantly reduced the growth of E. coli culture at 6 h compared with the control group ( Figure 5A, red line versus black line). The combination of PEL+LAT significantly reduce the growth of the E. coli culture at 6 h post-treatment ( Figure 5B). Interestingly, this effect was more pronounced than that observed for Pen/Strep at 20 h ( Figure 5B, blue line versus red line).
